title: As Tanks Rolled Into Ukraine, So Did Malware. Then Microsoft Entered the War.
abstract: After years of talks about the need for public-private partnerships to combat cyberattacks, the war in Ukraine is stress-testing the system.
byline: By David E. Sanger, Julian E. Barnes and Kate Conger

multimedia.caption: Ukrainians gather in a train station in Kyiv in an effort to leave the city shortly after the Russian invasion began.
